body_html:
it should work this way: bucketized_column(sequence_numeric_column(...), ...)
To do that, you need to update _BucketizedColumn. You can check the implementation in _EmbeddingColumn.
I'm okay with adding sequence support to bucketized column.
Thank you for contribution!
Since this is a new feature, It would be great to hear your experience too.

body:
it should work this way: `bucketized_column(sequence_numeric_column(...), ...)`
To do that, you need to update `_BucketizedColumn`. You can check the implementation in `_EmbeddingColumn`.
I'm okay with adding sequence support to bucketized column.
Thank you for contribution!
Since this is a new feature, It would be great to hear your experience too.
